attributes.action: Refund University Accommodation for those advised not to return to university
attributes.additional_details: Especially for those unable to pay and unable to work to earn the money to pay for accommodation, it is unfair to expect them to pay for accommodation they are being advised to not use.
attributes.background: Some students are expected to pay nearly £5,000 for a years worth of accommodation when they have been  advised not to return to university yet area still expected to pay full accommodation fees.
